item.description:
This is our regular monthly meeting.

I apologize but it seems that the meeting already scheduled for Nov 10 was deleted unintentionally.
Fear not! The meeting is still a go.

I am looking forward to this next meeting and am looking forward to getting to know some of our newest members. If you haven't been to one of our meetings before, or not for a while, come on down!

Please re-confirm your RSVP so that we all can get an idea as to how many will be attending.

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Casual Meetup
